definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: Parker also developed the modern theory of the solar magnetic field, including magnetic reconnection.
sentences.chinese: 帕克也提出現代太陽磁場理論，包括磁場重連。

sentences.english: Both of the inflow and the outflow were necessary for the reconnection.
sentences.chinese: 入流和出流都是重連所必需的。
